name: Out of Control (CristianDrift, Cabreira)
description:
Out of Control is a game where you need to survive at the galaxy. Simple as that. It has two problems: You'll start with a perfect space ship, but during some rounds you'll lose some parts of the ship. That will be a problem in the lasts rounds.

Besides that, the other problem is: The ship is getting some random inputs as movement. There will be some times that the ship will randomly move.

The song was made by Facemelting Solos. We really recommend his work.

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2020. 

Controls: SHIP MOVEMENTLeftCTRL and RightCTRLSHIELD MOVEMENTQ and ESHOOTWBOOSTO

Any bugs that you find, please tell us and we will fix it. This is our second game jam and second game. We didn't had so much time to fix some problems and do more features.
